caption.title: (a) Evolution of the NEE per Ni atom through the 10 activation cycles at 0.2C performed on NiFe20 (green diamond), NiFe15 (blue square), and NiFe7 (red circles), compared to β-Ni(OH) 2 Ni-B (black triangle). (b) Charge and discharge curves as a function of the specific capacity (mA h g −1 of compound) for the 10th activation cycle C-rate = 0.2C.
